TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BufferedWebEventProvider extends System.Web.Management.WebEventProvider
Public MustInherit Class BufferedWebEventProvider Inherits WebEventProvider
public ref class BufferedWebEventProvider abstract : System::Web::Management::WebEventProvider

summary.span: 提供用于创建需要缓冲的事件提供程序的基本功能。

span.span: Provides the base functionality for creating event providers that require buffering.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET health monitoring 允许生产和运营人员管理已部署的 Web 应用程序。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含的运行状况事件类型负责打包应用程序运行状况数据，以及负责处理此数据的提供程序类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在运行状况事件的管理过程中可帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 如果要自定义运行状况事件处理，则可以从类派生， 以创建自己的自定义缓冲提供程序。If you want to customize the health-event processing, you can derive from the class to create your own custom buffered provider. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，你将能够使用已实现的 ASP.NET health 监视类型，并且将通过在 "配置" 部分中指定值来控制运行状况监视系统 `healthMonitoring` 。In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. 还可以从运行状况监视类型派生，以创建自己的自定义事件和提供程序。You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers. 有关创建自定义提供程序的示例，请参阅 [如何：实现运行状况监视自定义提供程序示例](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms178718(v=vs.140))。For an example of creating a custom provider, see [How to: Implement the Health Monitoring Custom Provider Example](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms178718(v=vs.140)). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何从类派生， 以创建一个自定义提供程序，该提供程序将配置的事件写入本地文件，必须为该文件授予适当的访问权限。The following code example shows how to derive from the class to create a custom provider that writes the configured events to a local file for which appropriate access rights must be granted. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#1)] 下面的配置文件节选显示了一个 `healthMonitoring` 配置节，该配置节使 ASP.NET 可以使用上面定义的自定义提供程序来处理所有的运行状况监视事件。The following configuration file excerpt shows a `healthMonitoring` configuration section that enables ASP.NET to use the custom provider defined above to process all health-monitoring events. ``` ```

related.span: 安装和配置 ASP.NET 提供程序

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数由 ASP.NET health 监视系统在内部使用。This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system. 你永远不会使用它来实例化 对象，但你可以在实现继承自此类的提供程序类型时调用此构造函数。You will never use it to instantiate a object, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own provider type that inherits from this class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义事件提供程序中使用此构造函数。The following code example shows how to use this constructor in a custom event provider. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#8)]

summary.span: 获取一个指示提供程序使用的缓冲模式的值。

span.span: Gets a value indicating the buffering mode used by the provider.
The name of the buffering mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含由节的元素中的特性定义的值 `bufferMode` `providers` `healthMonitoring` 。The property contains the value defined by the `bufferMode` attribute in the `providers` element of the `healthMonitoring` section. 以下配置文件摘录显示了如何在节中定义缓冲区模式的名称 `healthMonitoring` 。The following configuration-file excerpt shows how the name of the buffer mode should be defined in the `healthMonitoring` section. ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 属性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Flush() cil managed

summary.span: 将事件从提供程序缓冲区移到事件日志中。

span.span: Moves the events from the provider's buffer into the event log.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法时，缓冲区中的所有事件会立即从缓冲区移动到日志，无论自上次写入以来经过了多少时间或缓冲区中有多少事件。When this method is called, all the events in the buffer are immediately moved from the buffer to the log, regardless of how much time has elapsed since last write or how many events are in the buffer. 上次写入的时间将重置为刷新操作的时间。The time of the last write is reset to the time of the flushing action. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#9)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 在 调用构造函数后调用方法 。ASP.NET calls the method after calling the constructor. 调用此方法以 通过配置文件中指定的配置设置和名称初始化。This method is called to initialize the with the configuration settings and name specified in the configuration file. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ProcessEvent(class System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent eventRaised) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ProcessEvent (eventRaised As WebBaseEvent)

summary.span: 处理传递给提供程序的事件。

span.span: Processes the event passed to the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是 ASP.NET 运行状况监视调用来开始处理事件的方法。This is the method that ASP.NET health monitoring calls to start the processing of the event. 如果启用缓冲，则会缓冲事件信息;否则，会将其调度到当前日志记录机制。If buffering is enabled, the event information is buffered; otherwise, it is dispatched to the current logging mechanism. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现 方法。The following code example shows how to implement the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ProcessEventFlush(class System.Web.Management.WebEventBufferFlushInfo flushInfo) cil managed
Public MustOverride Sub ProcessEventFlush (flushInfo As WebEventBufferFlushInfo)

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法处理已经缓冲的消息。The method processes the messages that have been buffered. ASP.NET 运行状况监视在需要刷新缓冲区时调用方法。ASP.NET health monitoring calls the method when the flushing of the buffer is required. 需要刷新的间隔由 `bufferMode` `providers` 配置部分中元素的属性的参数值决定 `healthMonitoring` 。The intervals at which flushing is required is determined by the parameter value of the `bufferMode` attribute in the `providers` element in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现 方法。The following code example shows how to implement the method. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/CS/bufferedwebeventprovider.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Management.BufferedWebEventProvider/VB/bufferedwebeventprovider.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Shutdown() cil managed

summary.span: 执行与关闭提供程序相关联的任务。

span.span: Performs tasks associated with shutting down the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 在 承载 Web 应用程序的应用程序域终止时调用方法。ASP.NET calls the method when the application domain hosting the Web application terminates. 调用方法来执行允许应用程序正常结束的任务，例如关闭资源。The method is called to perform tasks that will allow the application to end gracefully, such as closing resources.
